title: Mango Salsa
instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine diced mangoes, chopped red onion, minced jalapeño pepper, and chopped cilantro.
2. Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and toss gently to combine.
3. Season with salt to taste.
4. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
5. Serve as a topping for grilled fish, chicken, or tacos.
